title: Illuminating the Black Box: Real-Time Monitoring of Backdoor Unlearning in CNNs via Explainable AI
summary: Backdoor attacks pose severe security threats to deep neural networks by embedding malicious triggers that force misclassification. While machine unlearning techniques can remove backdoor behaviors, current methods lack transparency and real-time interpretability.
